rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading into the home, following Vastu principles with a balanced layout.
An open-plan living area integrating Brutalist design elements with concrete finishes and geometric patterns, complementing the home theater space.
A dedicated entertainment zone with acoustically optimized walls and built-in seating, designed as a separate compartment within the living area.
Functional kitchen space with an integrated dining nook, utilizing clean lines and minimalistic design in keeping with Brutalist aesthetics.
Modern bathroom with efficient layout, ensuring privacy and adherence to building norms.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and Vastu-aligned direction for tranquility.
Multi-functional study area that can be converted into a workspace or guest room as needed.
A smaller guest bedroom ensuring adequate space and privacy, designed with Vastu principles in mind.
A spacious outdoor balcony serving as a communal terrace with views of the swimming pool and landscaped garden.
An in-ground swimming pool designed to complement the Brutalist aesthetics while ensuring sufficient safety margins per local building norms.
